problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, point D is the midpoint of the AB, and DE ∥ BC, if the area of ​​△ADE is N_0, then the area of ​​△ABC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵点D是AB边的中点,且DE∥BC,∴AE=EC,∴DE是中位线,DE=\frac{1}{2}BC．∴DE:BC=1:2；∵DE∥BC,∴△ADE∽△ABC．∴S△ADE:S△ABC=1:4,∴△ABC的面积=8,故选:C．
